name: A Simple Game of Clock Themed Pinball
name_original: A Simple Game of Clock Themed Pinball
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50 with the theme of "Delay the inevitable"

It’s in the name! I only had one day to make my game, so I made a nice little game of pinball inside a grandfather clock.

Used 'A' and 'D' or Left and Right Arrow keys or the mouse buttons to control the paddles. Bounce off gears to collect points and increase your time limit. But drop too often or wait too long and it's game over!

I made the models myself but the textures are from Textures.com/Polyhaven and one sound is from Freesound.org:

"Classic Pinball Gameplay" by  theshaggyfreak https://freesound.org/people/theshaggyfreak/  licensed under CCBY 3.0
